column1: Nutritional values per ½ Deluxe Tub

Galia melon sherbet composed of two thirds melon pulp plus soy milk and protein to make it creamier. > 🌿 **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only soy milk and protein. Split the melon along its ‘equator’, spoon out the seeds and any soft flesh, remove the ‘polar caps’. Then use a vegetable knife to remove the skin, and cut into manageable pieces. Finally follow the directions below.
Spin on “Sorbet”, scrape down, and re-mix.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.
ICSv2 [Erythritol / Inulin / CMC / Guar / XG / Salt]
